description: This is a React functional component for a page that allows users to search and create Confluence spaces via a unified proxy tool. It manages form input, dispatches API invoke commands, and displays results or errors.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Asynchronously calls 'invokeTool' to search for Confluence spaces using input parameters and updates the result or error state accordingly.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Asynchronously calls 'invokeTool' to create a new Confluence space with specified name and updates the result or error state accordingly.
